description.short: Supervity for Microsoft Teams helps you become more productive than ever.
description.full:
Supervity is citizen automation platform to create, share and use digital skills. 
Supervity comes with a Skill Hub that acts as a global repository of skills created by Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) & Star Creators across popular software applications.The Supervity app for Microsoft Teams allows users to do the following tasks: 
 - Search for the skills in Supervity Skill Hub 
- Select and trigger the digital skill 
- Takes care of routine work heavily dominated by repetitive tasks 
- Enables faster adoption of software applications by automating tasks in minutes 
Some helpful commands: 
- Type **Sign in** to connect your Supervity and Microsoft Teams accounts 
- Type **Sign out** to disconnect your Supervity and Microsoft Teams accounts 
- Type **Help** to see this message again

commands.title: Sign in
commands.description: Log in or create a Supervity account
